title: environment w/ view: spack env activate: PATH not set right on RHEL8

labels.name: triage
labels.description: The issue needs to be prioritized

body:
Here is a case where `spack env activate` does not set `PATH` (and other environment variables) on RHEL 8

Using:
* `spack@develop` (379a1fd23bf464717b93a09fde68cf6469c2cbe7 from `Sat May 15 13:48:00 2021 -0700`)
* RHEL8 via container image `ecpe4s/rhel8-runner-x86_64:2021-05-16`

spack.yaml:
```
 spack:
  view: /bootstrap/view
  concretization: separately

  config:
    install_tree:
      root: /bootstrap/install

  packages:
    all:
      target: [x86_64]

  specs:
  - patchelf
```


```
$> spack -e . install --no-cache
==> Concretized patchelf
 -   hfkgaau  patchelf@0.12%gcc@8.3.1 patches=a155f233b228f02d7886e304cb13898d93801b52f351e098c2cc0719697ec9d0 arch=linux-rhel8-x86_64

==> Installing environment /
==> Installing patchelf-0.12-hfkgaauno6l77h5ds4hrj4xgpqalfmei
==> Fetching https://spack-llnl-mirror.s3-us-west-2.amazonaws.com/_source-cache/archive/69/699a31cf52211cf5ad6e35a8801eb637bc7f3c43117140426400d67b7babd792.tar.bz2
############################################################################################################################################### 100.0%

############################################################################################################################################### 100.0%
==> Applied patch https://github.com/NixOS/patchelf/pull/230.patch
==> patchelf: Executing phase: 'autoreconf'
==> patchelf: Executing phase: 'configure'
==> patchelf: Executing phase: 'build'
==> patchelf: Executing phase: 'install'
==> patchelf: Successfully installed patchelf-0.12-hfkgaauno6l77h5ds4hrj4xgpqalfmei
  Fetch: 0.37s.  Build: 8.12s.  Total: 8.49s.
[+] /bootstrap/install/linux-rhel8-x86_64/gcc-8.3.1/patchelf-0.12-hfkgaauno6l77h5ds4hrj4xgpqalfmei
==> Updating view at /bootstrap/view

$> ls -l /bootstrap/view/bin
patchelf

$> /bootstrap/view/bin/patchelf --version
patchelf 0.12.20200827.8d3a16e

$> spack env activate -d .

$> which patchelf
/usr/bin/which: no patchelf in (/spack/bin:/usr/local/sbin:/usr/local/bin:/usr/sbin:/usr/bin:/sbin:/bin)

$> spack env activate -d . --sh
export SPACK_ENV=/;
alias despacktivate='spack env deactivate';
```

This exact same environment can be activated on RHEL 7, Ubuntu 18.04, and Ubuntu 20.04 and `PATH` gets set correctly there. Just not here.
